nodes.text: The RH-34 Starforged assault cannon was a type of portable blaster cannon produced during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The Chiss Nil'Duru used one in combat during the events of the Order of Zildrog's campaign.
The RH-34 Starforged assault cannon was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the Apprentice's Shadow Pack.
